description:
For nearly 70 years, the legal team at our law firm, Drazin and Warshaw, P.C., has fought to protect the rights of innocent victims and their families. Today, our 11 experienced personal injury and workers' compensation attorneys continue the tradition attorney Louis M. Drazin began in 1947 when he devoted his legal practice to the people of New Jersey's Ocean and Monmouth counties. Thanks to our dedication, we now have three law offices in the region, including our law office in Brick.

At all of our locations, clients can expect the same high-quality legal services that we deliver with compassion and understanding. When you choose our firm, you receive not only legal representation but also a guide and a source of support, which are often much needed in the aftermath of an accident or loss.

Whether your injury or loss resulted from a car accident, a workplace injury or the negligence of a property owner, product manufacturer or medical professional, the attorneys at our law firm, Drazin and Warshaw, P.C., will fight to protect your rights and interests. If you would like to learn why our law firm is the first choice for so many people in New Jersey, we invite you to schedule a free initial consultation at our law office in Brick.
